metadata.title: Réponse au mémoire des citoyens Boccardo & Romairono, Jérome Ghiglino, Emmanuel Migono, Michel & Emmanuel Cadarmatori, Pierre Avegno, Jean-Baptiste & Pascal Saetoni, Jean-Baptiste Rebuffo & Joseph Vassallo, demandeurs en requête du 10 mars 1788, & en citation du 23 fructidor, an 4e. : pour les citoyens Ange Brasseti, Jean-André Ferrari & compag., Emmanuel-Joachin Ferrari, Jean-Batpiste Rotundo & fils, Hyacinthe & freres Jussan, Gresset, Enderlach, Marc Maraboto, Dominique Ferrari, Pascal Parodi, Pierre Marengo, Emmanuel Vigo, Joseph Favrega, Joseph Fabiano, François Pommier, Jean-Baptiste Bugia, Ange Borso, Gaëtan Sirombro, Antoine Pagano & fils, Jerome Bagnano, Dominique mOntobio, Vincent & Joseph-Marie Zenoglio, Nicolas Ravina, Pierre & Ange Ravina & compag., Jean-Baptiste Rabglieta, Charles & Jean-Baptiste Argento, Jean-Charles Palavicino, George Doria, Emmanuel Pallavicino, David Maistro, Jacques Traverso & Barthelemy Zino, défendeurs

metadata.notes: Title page located on front cover. No copyright page found. No table-of-contents pages found. Worn, damaged and discolored pages and cover. Skewed text. Uneven binding.
